column4: hello. i remstersys'ed an ubuntu 10.04 live cd but it doesnt have an installer. ubiquity from the console does not work. how can i install?
i asked a question several times but got no reply: i made an ubuntu 10.04 live cd with remastersys. however , it didnt include the installer. ubiquity from the console doesnt work. how can i install?
duct-tape it to your hard drive, that always works
